html:
You can save 15% on a ProGrade 512GB CFexpress 4.0 Type B memory card. You can currently get one at Amazon from the official ProGrade Store for $169 (Reg $199).

Key Features

  • 512GB Storage Capacity
  • Max Read Speed: 3400 MB/s
  • Max Write Speed: 3000 MB/s
  • Min Sustained Write Speed: 850 MB/s
  • Records Raw 8K, 6K, and 4K Video
  • Built-In Thermal Throttling
  • Compatible with Refresh Pro
  • Lower Power Consumption

ProGrade 512GB CFexpress 4.0 Type B Overview

Designed for capturing raw 8K, 6K, and 4K video, the 512GB CFexpress 4.0 Type B Gold Memory Card from ProGrade Digital provides read speeds of up to 3400 MB/s, which helps to quickly offload content to your computer, and write speeds of up to 3000 MB/s.

Additionally, the Gold has a minimum sustained write speed that is guaranteed not to drop below 850 MB/s. In addition to raw video, this card can also capture 8K, 6K, 4K ProRes 4444 video, ProRes 422 HQ video, and more.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
